item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.compute: §7 您可以使用此神奇工具訪問我們方塊的GUI。但是現在，它是無用的。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.energy_: §7可以檢測能量和充當電阻器
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.rs_brid: §7可以用於與精製儲存進行互動
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.chat_bo: §7可以在遊戲內聊天欄中讀和寫訊息
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.ar_cont: §7用於無線控制連結的 AR 眼鏡。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.ar_gogg: §7提供 HUD 覆蓋，由連結的 AR 控制器控制。右鍵單擊控制器以進行連結。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.memory_: §7可以保存玩家在庫存管理器中使用它的權利。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.invento: §7 此方塊可以從玩家的物品欄中發送或接收特定物件
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.redston: §7該方塊能夠與紅石互動。 與電腦的紅石端完全一樣。
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.periphe:
§7該方塊能夠與許多其他方塊進行互動。
  只需在它前面放置支援的方塊就可以使用它了。
text.advancedperipherals.linked_goggles: 成功連接 AR 護目鏡！
advancements.advancedperipherals.root.de: Every journey starts from first block ...
advancements.advancedperipherals.end_aut: If you can code gps-free position location with this, you win
advancements.advancedperipherals.overpow: Can you handle so much power?
advancements.advancedperipherals.ar_tool: 收集 AR功能的物品。現在你決定，現實是什麼樣子
advancements.advancedperipherals.base_to: Collect redstone integrator, inventory manager and energy detector. How did you even play without this?
advancements.advancedperipherals.nbt_too: Collect nbt storage and block reader. Now every world secret it open to you!
advancements.advancedperipherals.sense_t: Collect geo scanner and environmental detector. There is no limits for observability!
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.disable: §cThis item is disabled in config, so you can craft it, but peripheral logic will not work
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.block_r: §7This block is able to read data of blocks and tile entities in front of it
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.geo_sca: §7This block is able to scan area around him
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.colony_: §7This block is able to interact with mine colonies
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.nbt_sto: §7This block is able to store some nbt data
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.weak_au: §7Upgrade for turtle, that allow turtle to become useful again
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.overpow: §7Improved version of weak automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.end_aut: §7Upgrade for turtle, that allow basic interaction and teleportation in world
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.overpow: §7Improved version of end automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.husband: §7Upgrade for turtle, that allow basic interaction and advanced interaction with animals
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.overpow: §7Improved version of husbandry automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
text.advancedperipherals.automata_core_f: You trying to feed entity to soul, but your own body refuses to do this. Maybe something more mechanical can do this?
